q: Football fans cheer for hard hits all the time, and if the Bears were facing the Eagles, virtually every Bears fan would have joined Buehrle in hoping that Michael Vick got viciously hit. As James Harrison said, I don't want to injure anybody... I try to hurt people. In football, football fans root for players to get hurt. Football players try to inflict hurt. I'd find it easier to censure Buehrle if football's hypocrisy on pain weren't so transparent. Report

`` We're happy the majority of workers at Mirafiori has understood Fiat's commitment to transform it into a plant with an international reach,'' Sergio Marchionne , 58, said in an e-mailed statement today. We're happy because workers with their vote showed they have confidence in their future. Our plan for this plant is very ambitious. Sergio Marchionne needs a majority of the 5,500 employees at the factory to sign off a Dec. 23 accord already approved by most unions as he seeks to turn around Fiat's unprofitable Italian operations and revitalize an alliance

of a fire raging through the nearby headquarters of the ruling National Democratic Party in downtown Cairo, intruders climbed the gates, broke a window and entered the museum in a bid to steal the mummies. But demonstrators in collaboration with security forces stopped the thieves and returned the relics to the museum- but they were already damaged, Zahi Hawass said.`` Only their heads were intact,'' he added. If I can't control what happens to him, I can control what happens to me and I can channel this anger into a big bunch of love. Treatment of dialysis patients is paid for by Medicare, the U.S. health insurance program, which has imposed a new program to control costs. We think Amgen's pricing power will help offset any decline in the proportion of Aranesp sales derived from the U.S. dialysis market where Medicare bundling rules are being adopted, Eric Schmidt said in his note today.
